page.title: 18A SATURDAY IN MAY
page.content: On Saturday I wake up at 6.30am to take the dog for a walk with my dad. I get dressed, put on the dog's collar and lead and set off for a walk. When I get back my mum has my breakfast ready. I have Kellogs Rice Crispies,toast and coffee. I have it on a tray so that I can watch Popeye on TVam. It finishes at 7.30am. I usually play with my Lego until lunchtime. After lunch I get ready to go to watch Leicester City play football in Leicester. It finishes at about 5.00pm. When I get home I have my dinner then I go out to play with my friends until 8.30pm. When I come in I watch a video which my dad gets from the video shop. At 10.30pm I have my supper and go to bed.
